comment: When I voted against the war in Iraq in , I feared it would lead to greater destabilization of the region . That fear unfortunately turned out to be true . The U . S . has lost approximately brave troops , tens of thousands have been wounded , and we ve spent trillions .

                              :ARG3 (m2 / more))))
            :time (v / vote-01

                        :op1 w)))
      :snt2 (t / turn-out-11
            :ARG1 f
            :mod (t2 / that))

            :op2 (w2 / wound-01

            :op3 (s / spend-01

comment: Trump's dangerous escalation brings us closer to another disastrous war in the Middle East that could cost countless lives and trillions more dollars . Trump promised to end endless wars , but this action puts us on the path to another one .
